Microsoft Jigsaw includes tons of themes and puzzle images to choose from, and you can select the number of pieces in the puzzle to make it easier or more difficult. Place pieces one at a time while the timer ticks away - find the right fit for each piece quickly to earn bonus multipliers and get a high score!
